name: aws-cloud-cost-optimizer-dashboard
description: A multi-framework AWS cloud cost monitoring dashboard with React analytics and Angular budget management

scripts.build: npm run build:react && npm run build:angular
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/react-analytics && npm install && cd ../angular-budgets && npm install && cd ../../lambdas/get-costs && npm install && cd ../set-budget && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf apps/*/dist apps/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules lambdas/*/node_modules node_modules

author: Krishna Chaitanya
